thread.title: 11 Great Camping Tips And Tricks You Haven't Used Before
thread.title_full: 11 Great Camping Tips And Tricks You Haven't Used Before

author: Selena John
title: 11 Great Camping Tips And Tricks You Haven't Used Before

organizations.name: orange peel makes a great oil

text:
IN Lifestyle ON 24 Feb, 2017 11 Great Camping Tips And Tricks You Haven't Used Before Share on twitter Follow Us On 
Everything about camping is great, from fresh air to sleeping under the stars. You can spend a lot or a little money on your setup and tools, but you'll usually still forget something and need to whip up a quick fix to solve a problem. Read on for creative camping solutions! 11 Great Camping Tips And Tricks You Haven't Used Before 754 396 Great Camping Tips Tips And Tricks for camping camping experience #1. Aluminum Foil Is Your Best Friend 
Use it for packaging and grilling food over the fire, as well as fitting lids to cover up food during meals. #2. An Orange Peel Makes A Great Oil Lamp 
Leave enough of the centre rind intact, fill with cooking or lamp oil, and light it. It'll smell great! #3. Cut Up Soap Into Shavings 
You'll end up with single-use pieces that you can take on hikes, picnics, and more. #4. A Muffin Tray Makes A Great Drink Holder 
Obviously, it's great for baking muffins and cupcakes, but it'll provide a much-needed flat surface for picnics. #5. Try Making A Swedish Torch via 
You'll need to slice up a large log almost to its core and place kindling and firestarters inside of it. If you don't want to create a huge bonfire, this works great. It's also a great way to create a flat cooktop for meals.
